page.title: 16MOBBERLEY C. OF E. PRIMARY
page.content: The school was built near the Church in 1838 replacing the previous build- ing which stood in the Churchyard. At the present time there are 56 pupils with a headmaster and 2.5 teachers. The rector and Methodist Minister visit the school regularly to give church and christian teaching, while the children visit the church twice a term. At harvest time a Harvest Festival is held in school, while at Christmas a Carol service which includes a nativity or other dramatic present- ation also takes place in school. In July the children from the school join with other local youth groups to participate in a Youth Festival held in the church. At the age of eleven children leave this delightful school to attend Knutsford County High School.
